cm.model
Class Encounter

java.lang.Object
  cm.model.Encounter

public class Encounter
extends java.lang.Object

Defines a D&D 4e encounter.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Matthew Rinehart <gomamon2k at yahoo.com>

          Rolls initiative for each group of fighters, then starts the first fighter's turn.

          Individually rolls initiative for each Combatant in the encounter roster, then starts the first player's turn.

          Starts and immediately ends the turns of any inactive fighters between the previous active and the next active.

          Removes all enemies from the roster and applies an extended rest to the PCs.

          Removes all enemies from the roster and applies a short rest to the PCs.

          Removes all enemies from the roster and applies a short rest to the PCs.
 void updateAllStats(java.lang.Boolean configEntries)
          Calls Combatant.updateLibrary(StatLibrary, Boolean) for each fighter in the roster.

add

public void add(Stats stats,
                java.lang.Boolean libUpdate)
Adds a new Combatant with the supplied stats to the encounter. Calls add(Combatant, Boolean, Boolean) with a final parameter of 'true'.

Parameters:
stats - the Stats
libUpdate - if true, calls Combatant.updateLibrary(StatLibrary, Boolean)

add

public void add(Combatant combatant,
                java.lang.Boolean libUpdate,
                java.lang.Boolean configEntry)
Adds a new Combatant to the encounter.

Parameters:
combatant - the Combatant
libUpdate - if true, calls Combatant.updateLibrary(StatLibrary, Boolean)
configEntry - if true, updates a non-PC's fighter number from 0 to 1

startFight

public void startFight(java.lang.Boolean groupSimilar)
Rolls initiative for all in the roster and selects the current fighter.

Parameters:
groupSimilar - if true, similar NPCs will share the same initiative count

finishCurrentTurn

public void finishCurrentTurn()
Finishes the current fighter's turn and starts the next fighter's turn.

fighterInitMatch

private void fighterInitMatch(java.lang.String movingHandle,
                              java.lang.String targetHandle,
                              java.lang.Boolean moveAfter)
Updates one fighter's initiative to match another's.

Parameters:
movingHandle - the combat handle of the Combatant who is being updated
targetHandle - the combat handle of the Combatant who is being matched
moveAfter - if true, the moved fighter will go after the target instead of before
See Also:
fighterInitUpdate(String, Integer, Integer, Integer, Boolean)

fighterInitRollUpdate

public void fighterInitRollUpdate(java.lang.String combatHandle,
                                  java.lang.Integer init)
Updates the initiative roll of the fighter with the given combat handle to the result provided.

Parameters:
combatHandle - the combat handle
init - the new init roll
See Also:
fighterInitUpdate(String, Integer, Integer, Integer, Boolean)

fighterInitUpdate

private void fighterInitUpdate(java.lang.String combatHandle,
                               java.lang.Integer round,
                               java.lang.Integer init,
                               java.lang.Integer random3,
                               java.lang.Boolean goAfter)
Updates the initiative roll, current round, and random3 value of the fighter with the provided combat handle.

Parameters:
combatHandle - the combat handle
round - the new round
init - the new init roll
random3 - the new random3 value
goAfter - if true, the fighter will be placed after others with the same initiative result instead of before
See Also:
fighterInitUpdate(Combatant, Boolean)

private void fighterInitUpdate(Combatant fighter,
                               java.lang.Boolean goAfter)
Updates the initiative roll of the fighter provided.

Parameters:
fighter - the Combatant
goAfter - if true, the fighter will be placed after others with the same initiative result instead of before

Parameters:
source - the source handle
target - the target handle
dur - the EffectBase.Duration
Returns:
the round in which the effect would expire

public void moveToTop(Combatant fighter)
Relocates the provided fighter to the top of the initiative order.

Parameters:
fighter - the Combatant
See Also:

remove

public void remove(java.lang.String combatHandle)
Removes a given fighter from the roster.

Parameters:
combatHandle - the fighter's combat handle

resetEncounter

public void resetEncounter(java.lang.Boolean resetPCs)
Resets initiative for all Combatants in the encounter.

Parameters:
resetPCs - if true, resets health and power usage for PCs in addition to enemies

rollAllInitGrouped

private void rollAllInitGrouped()
Rolls initiative for each group of fighters, then starts the first fighter's turn.

rollAllInitUngrouped

private void rollAllInitUngrouped()
Individually rolls initiative for each Combatant in the encounter roster, then starts the first player's turn.

rollOneInit

public void rollOneInit(Combatant fighter)
Rolls initiative for a single fighter, and starts their turn if it puts them at the top of the list.

Parameters:
fighter - the Combatant for which we are rolling

selectCurrentFighter

private void selectCurrentFighter()
Selects the current fighter. Calls setSelectedFighter(Combatant) with getCurrentFighter().

skipInactive

private void skipInactive()
Starts and immediately ends the turns of any inactive fighters between the previous active and the next active.

size

public java.lang.Integer size()
Returns the size of the encounter roster.

Returns:
getRoster().size()

takeShortRest

public void takeShortRest()
Removes all enemies from the roster and applies a short rest to the PCs.

takeShortRestWithMilestone

public void takeShortRestWithMilestone()
Removes all enemies from the roster and applies a short rest to the PCs. Also grants an action point to each PC.

takeExtendedRest

public void takeExtendedRest()
Removes all enemies from the roster and applies an extended rest to the PCs.

public void updateAllStats(java.lang.Boolean configEntries)

Parameters:
configEntries - this is passed as the second parameter to Combatant.updateLibrary(StatLibrary, Boolean)
